original_text: “When you draw near to a city to fight against it, offer terms of peace to it.
korean_text: 네가 어떤 성읍으로 나아가서 치려 할 때에는 그 성읍에 먼저 화평을 선언하라

sentences.original_text: When you draw near to a city to fight against it
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 어떤 성과 싸우려고 가까이 이를 때에

sentences.original_text: offer terms of peace to it.
